An innovative product that keeps workers cool for up to 8 hours. Using technologies and materials designed to prevent heat stress this vest keeps the body at an ideal temperature allowing the wearer to work in comfort even in the hottest and most humid of weather. Simply saturate the vest in water and squeeze to remove any excess. The vest can then be worn and will not dampen any clothes underneath. When the vest becomes dry simply repeat for a further 8 hours of cool comfort.

Stand out in a vibrant two-tone high visibility vest. This style offers a range of extremely useful features in a choice of vivid colours. Perfect for corporate branding.

  • CE certified
  • Dual ID holder
  • Radio loop
  • Reflective tape
  • Front zip opening
  • Phone and pen holder pocket
  • Two lower patch pockets
  • D-ring
  • 7 pockets
  • Retail bag
  • Certified after 50x washes
products.short_description: Stand out in a vibrant two-tone high visibility vest. This style offers a range of extremely useful features in a choice of vivid colours. Perfect for corporate branding.

products.short_description: This Junior Vest features a youthful design by using angled reflective tape and contrast coloured binding. Available in a wide range of colours.

products.title: Vest-Port Thermal Waistcoat
products.description: The Vest-Port Thermal Waistcoat is the next generation in Vest-Port vest design. This style bonds 100% polyester anti-pill fleece to a 100% polyester warp knitted fabric. The result of this approach offers an advanced and ingenious fabric that is durable dependable and provides high levels of warmth and comfort for colder working environments perfect for airports or warehouses. All necessary features are catered for by offering a multitude of pockets a dual ID holder radio loop and smartphone pocket.
products.short_description: The Vest-Port Thermal Waistcoat is the next generation in Vest-Port vest design. This style bonds 100% polyester anti-pill fleece to a 100% polyester warp knitted fabric. The result of this approach offers an advanced and ingenious fabric that is durable dependable and provides high levels of warmth and comfort for colder working environments perfect for airports or warehouses. All necessary features are catered for by offering a multitude of pockets a dual ID holder radio loop and smartphone pocket.

products.title: Xenon Toolvest
products.description:
The multi-pocket toolvest combines modern design with highly durable EN ISO 20471 certified fluorescent fabric. The toolvest is crammed with features including twin stitched seams Dual ID holder holster pockets and waist belt for comfortable fit and support when bending and stretching. Multiple pockets offer secure storage.

  • Adjustable waistbelt
  • CE certified
  • Phone pocket
  • Dual ID holder
  • Pen division
  • Radio loop
  • Reflective tape
  • Twin-stitched seams
  • Zipped pockets
  • Holster pockets
  • D-ring
  • 10 pockets
  • Durable polycotton fabric
  • Certified after 50x washes
products.short_description: The multi-pocket toolvest combines modern design with highly durable EN ISO 20471 certified fluorescent fabric. The toolvest is crammed with features including twin stitched seams Dual ID holder holster pockets and waist belt for comfortable fit and support when bending and stretching. Multiple pockets offer secure storage.

products.title: Hi-Vis Versatile Vest
products.description:
This vest adopts a classic 2 band tape formation using our HiVisTex tape and high visibility fabric with the added benefit of 3 multi-function loops which are compatible with the HV07 attachable LED lights for extra visibility in low light conditions.

  • CE certified
  • Reflective tape
  • Hook and loop closure
  • Complies with RIS 3279-TOM for rail industry (orange only)
  • Lightweight
  • Generous fit
  • Certified after 50x washes
  •  Multi-function loops suitable for LED, radio,
    pen or glasses attachment
products.short_description: This vest adopts a classic 2 band tape formation using our HiVisTex tape and high visibility fabric with the added benefit of 3 multi-function loops which are compatible with the HV07 attachable LED lights for extra visibility in low light conditions.

• Hi-Vis Yellow,Orange & Yellow/Orange conform to EN ISO20471:2013 Class 2
